definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The C college of Cardinals elects and advises the Pope.
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教团选举教皇并为其咨询。

sentences.english: The Pope has a house with cardinals and bishops.
sentences.chinese: 教皇有一个由红衣主教和主教组成的议院。

sentences.english: Cardinal Meschia was without doubt a singular character.
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教梅斯基亚无疑是个怪人。

sentences.english: Alexandra: What is your opinion of the resignation of Cardinal Bertoni?
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教Bertoni辞职，你有什么见解？

sentences.english: Who elects the Pope? Well the cardinals.
sentences.chinese: 教皇是谁选举的？，是红衣主教。

sentences.english: It is more coquettish . It is opposite the fountain of Cardinal de Birague.
sentences.chinese: 它的建筑优美，正对着红衣主教比拉格的喷泉。

sentences.english: Formerly Cardinal Health's Pharmaceutical Technologies and Services Div .
sentences.chinese: 原红衣主教卫生医药技术和服务股利。

sentences.english: There won't be any Arizona Cardinal-type run to ruin Stern's party.
sentences.chinese: 斯特恩不允许再有红衣主教那样的人搅乱他的派对。

sentences.english: His doggy pals join him by sporting elegant cardinal and bishop costumes.
sentences.chinese: 其他狗狗们也分别穿上了红衣主教和主教的服装。

sentences.english: Good Madame, recommend us to the prayers of your sainted relative, Monsieur the Cardinal.
sentences.chinese: 仁慈的夫人，请您代求贵戚红衣主教先生为我们祷告。

sentences.english: I've had dinner with Bill and Cardinal Spellman.
sentences.chinese: 我同比尔和斯佩尔曼红衣主教一起吃过晚饭。

sentences.english: Cardinal Richelieu is plotting against Queen Anne.
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教黎塞留是阴谋反对安妮女王。

sentences.english: The Parliament groveled in the dust at the Cardinal's feet.
sentences.chinese: 国会屈服于红衣主教之下。

sentences.english: They were encouraged by a promise from Cardinal Winning.
sentences.chinese: 红衣主教温宁的许诺使他们受到鼓舞。

sentences.english: It is opposite the fountain of Cardinal de Birague.
sentences.chinese: 它的建筑优美，正对着红衣主教比拉格的喷泉。

sentences.english: I talked to one of the cardinals.
sentences.chinese: 我和一位红衣主教谈过话。

definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
